channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russian operatives are targeting Tim Walz, spreading viral disinformation about his time as a teacher
item.description: Digital researchers had already linked the video to Russia, but this is the first time federal authorities have confirmed the connection.

item.description: By learning to appreciate positive skew and its associated tail events, investors can unlock the full potential of stock market gains.

item.title: Make French Fries Great Again

item.title: Happy 60th Anniversary CAPM! Why the Capital Asset Pricing Model Still Matters
item.description: The CAPM has its critics. Yet, the model, introduced by Bill Sharpe in 1964, remains front and center in academia and in practice.
